Use the following [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE]:

"Create a complete Off-Page SEO strategy for DYNMC Life, a minimalist activewear brand. Include:
– 20+ high-DA do-follow backlink sources (profile creation, social bookmarks, business listings)
– A 30-day backlink building calendar with weekly tasks
– A list of niche guest post sites for fashion, lifestyle, and wellness
– Social sharing platforms with strategy for Pinterest, Tumblr, Quora, and Reddit
– Tips for influencer outreach and co-branding
– Recommended content syndication platforms (e.g., Medium, Scoop.it, etc.)
Ensure it’s tailored for growing an activewear e-commerce brand’s domain authority and organic visibility."
PromptHint: Use this prompt to generate a full off-page SEO strategy including backlink sources, guest posts, influencer outreach, social sharing, and more — tailored for DYNMC Life’s activewear brand.
